sentences.en: a swap meet for collectors of Star Trek memorabilia
sentences.cn: 《星际迷航》纪念品收藏者交流会

sentences.en: Do not swap horse when crossing a stream.
sentences.cn: 中流不换马;危局不易人.

sentences.en: Do not swap horses when crossing a stream.
sentences.cn: 当你横过溪流的时候,不要掉换你的马匹.

sentences.en: Do you want to swap umbrellas?
He offered to swap his camera for hers.
sentences.cn: 他表示要与她交换相机.

sentences.en: I want to sit where you're sitting; shall we swap round?
sentences.cn: 我想坐在你坐的地方, 我们对换一下好 吗 ?

sentences.en: I will swap you my bicycle for your radio.
sentences.cn: 我想拿我的自行车换你的收音机.

sentences.en: I'd gladly swap places with mummy any day.
sentences.cn: 什么时候让我和妈妈交换角色我都愿意。

sentences.en: I'll swap ( you ) my Michael Jackson tape for your Bruce Springsteen album.
sentences.cn: 我想用迈克尔.杰克逊的录音带交换你的布鲁斯. 斯普林斯廷唱片集.

sentences.en: I'll swap you this for that.
sentences.cn: 我用这个和你交换那个吧.

sentences.en: I've finished this magazine. Can I swap with you?
sentences.cn: 这本杂志我看完了。我能跟你交换一下吗？

sentences.en: If she ever fancies a job swap, I could be interested.
sentences.cn: 如果她想和别人互换工作，我会很感兴趣的。

sentences.en: Next week they will swap places and will repeat the switch weekly.
sentences.cn: 下周他们将交换座位，并且以后每周换一次。

sentences.en: They only have six plots , but they swap them round a bit.
sentences.cn: 就六个情节, 抄来抄去的.

sentences.en: This comic was a swap that I got from Nick.
sentences.cn: 这本漫画书是我从尼克那里换来的.

sentences.en: We can do a swap if you like.
sentences.cn: 如果你愿意我们可以交换。

sentences.en: We did not wait to swap knives.
sentences.cn: 我们并不等到短兵相见.

trans.tran_en: a situation in which you give something to someone and get another thing in return
to give something to someone and get something in return
to give something to someone and get something in return
to give something to someone and get something in return
to give something to someone and get something in return

trans.tran_cn: 用…替换，把…换成，掉换（过来）
